subtitle: A deliciously sweet tea time treat.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Lightly grease and line a 900 g loaf tin.
Sift the flour, salt and spice together in a bowl. Rub in the butter, until the mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs.
Stir in the sugar, almonds and apricots. Beat the eggs together with the honey and milk. Pour into the dry ingredients, stirring until smooth and well blended.

Spoon into loaf tin and smooth over the surface. Bake in oven for 1 hour, until a skewer inserted in the centre comes out clean. Leave to cool in the tin for approx. 30 min. Turn out and serve in slices.

title: Roasted almond and honey teabread
